Ansible Provisioning tool(APT) user password reset guide

  1. Ansible Web URLhttps://pcdcawxlxap01:8043/#/home
  2. Log in using your ID.
  3. After you log in go to Templates page,
  4. The template page has a template to reset your password, At the right-hand corner, you have a launch button with which you can launch the template.
  5. Fill in the your new password and select the server you want to reset, you can type “all” if you want to reset your password on all the servers.
  6. After that you will be taken to the output page where you would see what happened, look for the successful output.
